page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The village halls and the community centre are where most entertainment in the block is arranged. In Longhoughton Bingo sessions are held every Wednesday and Friday and these are well-attended.A leek club holds various functions at the Burnside,our local public house.Christmas time brings dances and parties arranged by the R.A.F.and local residents. Entertainment in Howick centres around the Womens Institute and the Cricket Club. The Northumberland Theatre Company is based in Alnwick,our nearest town, There is,therefore,some live theatre in the area.Our nearest cinema is some 25 miles away. Most of the entertainment, is arranged by the local people, themselves.
